comment: * Class that holds information about a Font.

methods.name: public String getFontName()
methods.comment: * Returns the name associated by the system to this font.

methods.name: public int getTtcIndex()
methods.comment: * Returns the index to be used to access this font when accessing a TTC file.

methods.name: public FontVariationAxis[] getAxes()
methods.comment: * Returns the list of axes associated to this font.

methods.name: public int getWeight()
methods.comment: * Returns the weight value for this font.

methods.name: public boolean isItalic()
methods.comment: * Returns whether this font is italic.

methods.name: public Uri getUri()
methods.comment:
* Returns the content uri associated to this font.
         *
         * You can reach to the font contents by calling {@link
         * android.content.ContentResolver#openInputStream}.
